Contact - City of Gold Bar est. 1910



Contact
=======



Below you will find a directory of contacts for the City of Gold Bar.

**Gold Bar City Hall Main Line:**
360.793.1101
(Final Utility Requests please contact
[**d.beaston@cityofgoldbar.us**](mailto:d.beaston@cityofgoldbar.us)
)
**Mailing Address:**
107 5th Street, Gold Bar WA 98251

Monday Thru Friday 8AM till 5PM, with Daily Closure From 12PM till 1PM!

please contact Office Manager
[**Denise Beaston**](mailto:d.beaston@cityofgoldbar.us)
and/or Public Works Director Rich Norris. Please note that our office hours are Monday Thru Thursday, 8am to 5pm with closing daily from 12-1pm for lunch.

Payments received after 4:45PM will be posted to next business day!

**City of Gold Bar Mayor**
–
[**Steve Yarbrough**](mailto:mayor@cityofgoldbar.us)

Mayor Steve Yarbrough, Cell 425.238.2655

**Public Works Director –
Office Hours Monday – Thursday, 8am to 5pm**
**[Rich Norris](mailto:r.norris@cityofgoldbar.us)**

**Office Manager/Utility Billing Clerk/Violations Bureau Clerk/Animal Control/Code Enforcement/Emergency Management Coordinator –
Office Hours Monday – Thursday, 8am to 5pm**
[**Denise Beaston**](mailto:d.beaston@cityofgoldbar.us)

**Clerk Treasurer/Notary – Office Hours Tuesday – Friday, 8am to 5pm**
[**Lisa Stowe**](mailto:clerk.treasurer@cityofgoldbar.us)

(For Utility Billing and Building permit questions/requests contact Denise Beaston
)

Contact Water Manager
**Richard Baker, 425.238.1935**
or
**Public Works Director Rich Norris, 425.238.4649**

**Water Quality Problems contact City Hall**
Our office hours are Monday – Friday 8am – 5pm.
*We are closed daily from 12pm – 1pm*
please contact Water Manager
**Richard Baker at 425.238.1935**
or
**Public Works Director Rich Norris at 425.238.4649**

**Report Power Outages (SNO COUNTY PUD)
Online Outage Reporting (click here)
Phone: Automated 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
425-783-1001 (toll-free at 1-877-783-1001)**

**Gold Bar Police Chief Carl Whalen – Snohomish County Sheriff’s**

Email Address:

[Carl.Whalen@co.snohomish.wa.us](mailto:Carl.Whalen@co.snohomish.wa.us)

Building Official Tim Nordvedt
